name: Neko Ex Machina
description:
A love letter to the golden age of retro JRPGs!

Controls :
Arrows keys to move.
Spacebar to confirm.
X to Cancel.
Hold Shift to dash while moving (unavailable on the world map).

Four catgirls wake up into a ravaged world. What happened here? And why is this island ruled by mechanic soldiers?

Custom graphics and design, all made with love! Zero royalty-free!

8 playable classes for your characters!
You can play as a warrior or an elementalist if you like being brutal. Do you prefer slow and painful deaths? Play as a Poison Ivy!

A vast island to explore, with many optional caverns and dungeons! Sometimes with puzzles!

Read books, learn about the lore if you want, discover what happened to this world. Fight powerful foes and save the world (oh, taht's original)!

Note from the developer, Frelon-K :

Hi! This is my very first game, the first one I manage to finish! I hope you will enjoy this! This is a short JRPG that lasts around 15 hours because I work solo. I did everything myself, from graphics to music. I promise I'll make a sequel to Neko Ex Machina, with a vaster world, references and a deeper gameplay! I used RPG maker MV, because I am an artist before being a developer, so I took an easy shortcut to realize my dream. But hey, I customized everything! I hope you will enjoy my game! Cheers!
